about_the_game:
Farmageddon is a turn-based strategy game about farming in the post-apoclayptic desert wastes of New San Fransisco.

The world has been sundered by the great cataclysm, reducing the environment to sand and silt and dust. How will we grow enough food to sustain our colony of survivors?

Don't lose hope just yet! With advances in radioactive farming technology, we can rapidly grow a seed into a fruitful harvest in just a day!! And it's totally safe! ...so long as you don't lose your farm (or your farmers) to the endless waves of gigantic bugs.



  • Tactical Farming: Each and every turn, you must tend to your crops by seeding, watering, and harvesting them. And all while fending off waves of bugs!
  • Colony Building: With the money from your crops, build out your base with defenses. Recruit new scavengers to grow your colony!!
  • Roguelike Survival: You only live once. Can you protect your colony from being wiped?
